input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP Team Evo Cargo Bibshorts'
  - Name='Assos Men's Mille GT C2 Bib Short'
  - Name='Assos Men's T. Mille Gore Bike Wear Bicycle Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Pro-Level Comfort Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pactimo Women's Summit Raptor Compression Bibs'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Equipe R S9 bib short - Black S / Black'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Free Aero Race S Limited Edition Bibshort'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Bib Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Free Aero RC Classic Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Men's Padded Comfort Bike Stretch Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Unlimited Bib Shorts'
  - Name='ASSOS EQUIPE R Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Summit Cycling Shorts with Liner'
  - Name='Pactimo Women's Range Trail Bib Liner'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Competizione 2 Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Pactimo Women's Range Trail Shorts'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Insider 2 Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Pactimo Women's Range Trail Short Liner'
  - Name='Pactimo Women's Featherweight Flyte Cycling Bibs'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Summit Pro Shell Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful R & D Celsius bibshort'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Rove Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Cycling Shorts with Liner'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Team Evo Cargo Bibshorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: The MAAP bibshorts share the bibshort design and intended use but include cargo features indicating a slightly different design focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Mille GT C2 Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Assos Mille GT C2 is a high-performance cycling bibshort, very similar in function and construction to the Pedal Mafia Pro Delta Bib.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's T. Mille Gore Bike Wear Bicycle Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This bibshort likely offers advanced features, similar silhouette and function, though specialized with Gore fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Pro-Level Comfort Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro-Level Comfort bibshorts also focus on comfort and performance in a bibshort silhouette, closely aligned with the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Women's Summit Raptor Compression Bibs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though similar bibshort style and cycling use, designed for women and compression focus may make it less identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rapha Core bibshorts are designed similarly for all-day comfort and performance in a bibshort format, closely relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe R S9 bib short - Black S / Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Equipe R S9 bibshorts are top-tier race bibs similar in construction and technology to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Free Aero Race S Limited Edition Bibshort
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance race bibshort with advanced aero and comfort features, very similar in silhouette and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Bib Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quest bibshorts focus on value and endurance cycling, sharing basic bibshort design but possibly less technical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Free Aero RC Classic Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another high-end race bibshort with advanced features similar in purpose and construction to the Pro Delta Bib.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Padded Comfort Bike Stretch Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Comfort-focused padded bibshort variant with similar materials and silhouette, relevant though possibly less race-focused.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Unlimited Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quality all-around bibshorts from Castelli designed for comfort and durability, aligned with reference in function and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS EQUIPE R Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Again, a top-end race bibshort from Assos closely matching the performance and design features of the Pedal Mafia model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro cycling shorts may be similar but lack the bib component mentioned in the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Summit Cycling Shorts with Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts with liner rather than bibshorts, somewhat relevant but different construction and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Women's Range Trail Bib Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib liner suggests a base layer rather than full bibshort; more different in purpose though same cycling use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Competizione 2 Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling shorts likely similar in padding and construction but may lack bib straps; less relevant than full bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Women's Range Trail Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts rather than bibs and designed for women; likely less relevant to the bibshort reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Insider 2 Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling shorts but potentially lacking bib straps; similar function but silhouette slightly different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Women's Range Trail Short Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short liner is base layer not full bibshort; notable difference in construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Women's Featherweight Flyte Cycling Bibs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Womenâ€™s cycling bibs with featherweight design focus; similar silhouette and function though gender-specific design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Summit Pro Shell Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro shell cycling shorts suggest outer layer only; less relevant than bibshorts in construction and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful R & D Celsius bibshort
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance bibshort designed for racing and endurance similar to the Pedal Mafia bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Rove Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rove shorts are likely designed for adventure or casual riding, less performance bibshort focus.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts with liner not full bibshort; some relevance for cycling use but different construction than bibshorts.
